title: Smart chat assistant with GPT-5, Google Sheets, and Pinecone RAG memory
description:
## üìä Description
Empower your workflows with an intelligent AI chat assistant that retrieves real-time context from Google Sheets and a Pinecone knowledge base using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). ü§ñüìÇ
 This workflow processes chat messages, retrieves relevant contextual data, generates natural and context-aware responses via OpenAI GPT-5, and automatically logs every interaction in Google Sheets. It also auto-indexes new documents from Google Drive into Pinecone for knowledge expansion and emails weekly chat history summaries for review. üí¨üìä

## What This Template Does
1Ô∏è‚É£ Chat Trigger ‚Äì Receives incoming chat messages through a webhook. üí¨
 2Ô∏è‚É£ Data Enrichment ‚Äì Extracts topic, intent, and context from messages. üß©
 3Ô∏è‚É£ Context Retrieval ‚Äì Fetches structured data from Google Sheets and semantic data from Pinecone. üß†
 4Ô∏è‚É£ AI Response Generation ‚Äì Uses GPT-5 to produce relevant, human-like replies with contextual references. ü§ñ
 5Ô∏è‚É£ Conversation Logging ‚Äì Stores chat sessions with timestamps and detected intent in Google Sheets. üìã
 6Ô∏è‚É£ Knowledge Base Expansion ‚Äì Automatically indexes new files from Google Drive to Pinecone for future RAG responses. üìÇ
 7Ô∏è‚É£ Weekly Report ‚Äì Aggregates all chats and sends an email summary with logs attached via Gmail every Monday. üìß

## Key Benefits
‚úÖ AI chat assistant with contextual accuracy using RAG
 ‚úÖ Auto-updating knowledge base via Google Drive ‚Üí Pinecone
 ‚úÖ End-to-end chat tracking and audit-ready logging
 ‚úÖ Weekly performance reports via Gmail
 ‚úÖ Seamless integration with Google Workspace

## Features
- Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) workflow
- Google Sheets integration for structured memory
- Pinecone vector database for semantic retrieval
- GPT-5 for context-aware conversation generation
- Google Drive watcher for automatic knowledge updates
- Gmail integration for weekly report delivery
- Built-in JSON validation and session memory

## Requirements
- OpenAI API key (GPT-4/GPT-5)
- Google Sheets OAuth2 credentials
- Pinecone API credentials
- Google Drive OAuth2 credentials
- Gmail OAuth2 credentials

## Replace:
- PINECONE_INDEX with your index name
- GOOGLE_SHEET_ID with your log sheet ID
- GOOGLE_DRIVE_FOLDER_ID with monitored folder

## Target Audience
- Support and helpdesk automation teams üí¨
- AI chatbot developers enhancing context recall ü§ñ
- Businesses maintaining searchable conversation history üè¢
- Knowledge managers syncing chat + document intelligence üß†

## Step-by-Step Setup Instructions
1Ô∏è‚É£ Connect your OpenAI, Pinecone, Google Sheets, Google Drive, and Gmail credentials.
 2Ô∏è‚É£ Update the Pinecone index and Google Sheet ID in the nodes.
 3Ô∏è‚É£ Set your chat webhook URL for real-time message input.
 4Ô∏è‚É£ Add your Google Drive folder ID for automated knowledge ingestion.
 5Ô∏è‚É£ Test the chat workflow with sample messages.
 6Ô∏è‚É£ Enable the schedule trigger to email weekly chat logs automatically. ‚úÖ
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
